DOC.brief_summary: To compare accuracy ultrasound guide fine needle aspiration ( FNA ) core needle biopsy ( CNB ) ultrasound detect abnormal axillary lymph node patient newly diagnose invasive breast cancer suspect invasive breast cancer . Hypothesis : FNA CNB equivalent diagnostic accuracy In order prove hypothesis , perform FNA CNB lymph node consent patient . The two sample evaluate separately different pathologist blind material sample . The result biopsy compare gold standard ( lymph node excision ) .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy FNA Versus CNB Abnormal Axillary Lymph Nodes Setting Invasive Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Recent suspect diagnosis invasive breast cancer abnormal ipsilateral axillary lymph node Able provide inform consent Lymph node amenable core biopsy Patient unlikely undergo lymph node excision ( i.e . elderly patient comorbidities )
